name: Chaolf (davisarthur)
description:
This game was inspired by "dynamical billiards," one of the simplest physical systems known to exhibit chaos! If you are interested, read more here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dynamical_billiards.

The 2D art assets were downloaded from Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/).

The music was downloaded from Cron Audio off of the Unity Asset Store.
